summary: Defines a custom Stable Diffusion pipeline that converts textual prompts into images, handling text encoding, latent diffusion with a conditional UNet and scheduler, VAE decoding, optional safety checking, and supports seed resizing for flexible image dimensions.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to generate high‑quality text‑to‑image content using a configurable diffusion model while allowing control over seed size and image resolution, facilitating experimentation and integration into creative applications.
